transcript: when you go back home and your dad says you know Alexander always has been pretty loose with the alcohol and he says this to somebody else in the family when you're at dinner I am super aggressive about this I'm like what the  do you want me to be worse do you want me to be loose with alcohol what do you want because by you saying that it encourages it it reinforces that behavior so don't speak that over me now me saying it like this is how I talk to people that will probably make you uncomfortable it will certainly make them uncomfortable but the thing is is that when you go back home if you have to go back home you have to draw lines in the sand and say like you will not treat me this way let me teach you how to treat me
